WorkItem.Description:
As per the discussion [here](https://x12parser.codeplex.com/discussions/462635):

Typed N1 loops only support a single type of N1 loop in a file. If a spec (like 834) has multiple N1 loops with different types, they will not work.
WorkItem.Summary: Multiple Typed N1 loops not supported in single EDI file

Comments.Message: I've ran into the same issue.  It does however let me parse out an existing 834 and SerializeToX12 with no problems that I can see using Liaison EDI Notepad.

*BUMP*

I submitted a patch for this (15428) a few months ago, but I haven't seen it get reviewed yet. Do you guys have any plans to integrate this fix?
